mapper.sql: id, create_time, update_time, user_id, project_id, permission
mapper.select: SELECT id, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, code, content_id as contentId, progress, funding, `name` FROM kc_project pro WHERE id IN (SELECT p_u.project_id FROM kc_project_user AS p_u LEFT JOIN kc_user ON kc_user.id = p_u.user_id WHERE p_u.user_id = #{id})

SELECT kc_user.id AS id, kc_student.`name` AS `name`, kc_student.number AS number, kc_user.telephone AS telephone, kc_user.username AS username, permission AS permission FROM kc_project LEFT JOIN kc_project_user p_u ON kc_project.id = p_u.project_id LEFT JOIN kc_user ON p_u.user_id = kc_user.id LEFT JOIN kc_user_authentication u_a ON kc_user.id = u_a.user_id LEFT JOIN kc_student ON u_a.authentication_id = kc_student.id WHERE kc_project.id = #{id} AND is_student = 1 ORDER BY permission ASC

SELECT kc_user.id AS id, kc_teacher.`name` AS `name`, kc_teacher.number AS number, kc_user.telephone AS telephone, kc_user.username AS username, permission AS permission FROM kc_project LEFT JOIN kc_project_user p_u ON kc_project.id = p_u.project_id LEFT JOIN kc_user ON p_u.user_id = kc_user.id LEFT JOIN kc_user_authentication u_a ON kc_user.id = u_a.user_id LEFT JOIN kc_teacher ON u_a.authentication_id = kc_teacher.id WHERE kc_project.id = #{id} AND is_student = 0 ORDER BY permission ASC
